report.title: For Life
report.author: Be
report.bodytext: I have taken opaites for 28 years every day, SMACK, OXYCOT. 40mgs up to 8 a day, HYDROCODONE pills up to 20 a day. I do not know how my liver survied all the Tylenol TRIED 4 TREATMENT PROGRAMS with no luck. Then 5 years ago I Started the METHADONE program In short, it has saved my life.
